userCommunication
Class MenuOption

java.lang.Object
  userCommunication.MenuOption
Direct Known Subclasses:
DoubleValueMenuOption, IntValueMenuOption
public class MenuOption
extends Object

Represents a single menu option that can be printed and selected by the user

Version:
1.0 Last Modified: Feb 18, 2014 - Created (Jordan Kidney)
Author:
Jordan Kidney
